name: agent-orchestration
description: Multi-agent workflow coordination with production-ready optimization workflows, systematic agent improvement methodologies, and comprehensive documentation. Features executable slash commands with real-world examples showing 50-200x performance improvements.
author: Wei Chen
changelog: v1.0.3: Version consolidation release. Corrected version numbering from v1.0.2 to v1.0.1 for agents, maintained v1.0.2 command improvements, and ensured version consistency across all documentation.

agents.name: context-manager
agents.description: Elite AI context engineering specialist mastering dynamic context management, vector databases, knowledge graphs, and intelligent memory systems.
agents.improvements: v1.0.1: Added triggering criteria, Constitutional AI framework, reasoning framework, 3 comprehensive examples, enhanced behavioral traits, and output format standards. v1.0.3: Version consolidation.

agents.name: multi-agent-orchestrator
agents.description: Multi-agent orchestrator specializing in workflow coordination and distributed systems. Expert in agent team assembly and task allocation for scalable collaboration. Delegates all domain-specific work to specialist agents.
agents.improvements: v1.0.1: Added 5-step chain-of-thought orchestration process, 5 Constitutional AI principles, 4 comprehensive few-shot examples, output format standards, advanced orchestration patterns, anti-patterns section, enhanced decision framework, and delegation strategy. v1.0.3: Version consolidation.

commands.name: /multi-agent-optimize
commands.description: Multi-agent code optimization with executable workflows (scan/analyze/apply modes), graceful fallback for missing agents, and comprehensive documentation with real case studies showing 50-208x speedups
commands.improvements: v1.0.2: Added execution logic for --mode=scan, YAML frontmatter with graceful fallbacks, 19% token reduction (382→311 lines), external documentation structure, and 3 domain-specific pattern libraries. v1.0.3: Version consolidation.

commands.name: /improve-agent
commands.description: Systematic agent improvement through 4-phase methodology (analysis, prompt engineering, testing, deployment) with executable workflows and A/B testing framework
commands.improvements: v1.0.2: Added execution logic for --mode=check, YAML frontmatter structure, 20% token reduction (291→234 lines), 4 phase-specific guides, and comprehensive examples with measured improvements. v1.0.3: Version consolidation.

skills.name: multi-agent-coordination
skills.description: Production-ready multi-agent coordination with team assembly, workflow orchestration, DAG-based execution, inter-agent messaging, and fault-tolerant coordination patterns

skills.name: agent-performance-optimization
skills.description: Comprehensive agent performance monitoring, optimization, and tuning including metrics collection, caching strategies (LRU, multi-tier), load balancing (round-robin, least-loaded, weighted), and performance profiling
